response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and significance for us. Considering its worth to you, I propose a special offer. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $750,000. This offer is tailored to recognize your interest and commitment to this exceptional item. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
